ritual.text.configuration: You shall have the following configuration:
ritual.samas.tablet.text:
Group 1
Purifying the Patient in front of Samas.

With a Leather Waterskin you grab a
hold of pure water from a nearby
river.

Perform the ritual at night.

In a 3 meters long table, place down
food offerings to Samas.

In front of it, put down ceramic altars
with the sides having honey flasks and
the middle the item you shall dispose
witchcraft onto.

Place the four figurines of the
witch/warlock who has attacked you.
Burn it down.

Recite the incantation from this tablet,
after the ritual is over, dispose of the
infused item.
ritual.pazuzu.tablet.text:
Group AG
Blessing before Pazuzu.

Perform the ritual at night.

Wear Pazuzu's Amulet, with His imagery.

In a 3 meter-long table, place down a
clay figurine of Him in the center.

In front of it, put down three evenly
spaced ceramic altars with the offering
on the sides having rotten or
poisonous famished food and
the center having an object of value.

Recite this tablet's incantation upon
the object of value, then you will have
his Blessing for the night until dawn.
ritual.udug.tablet.text:
Group B6
Udug before Pazuzu.

This is an advanced witchcraft ritual
made for a witch who has gained the
Blessing of Pazuzu, from group AG.

For the preparation of the ritual, kill
a Sheep or Bear with Gebel's knife and
bottle his bile from the liver.
You must have two bottles.

In ritual, at night, stand in front of a
3-meter long table with the
Bile Bottles at the sides.

Fill the surroudings of the ritual with
a Zissuru flour protection circle,
protecting yourself from danger.

To assure control, wear a regular
Pazuzu's Amulet at all times.

Recite the tablet's incantation upon
Pazuzu's clay figure, placed in the center.

The Udug will last until dawn, for your
power grows weak and his figure weakens
as well. The user of witchcraft shall borrow the
Udug's poisonous fangs and he shall
follow him everywhere he goes.
ritual.pazuzu.notday: You must perform this ritual at night.
item.arstheurgia.cooked_clay_tablet_sama: Group 1: Purifying the Patient in front of Samas.
item.arstheurgia.tablet_part_samas.toolt: Group 1: Purifying the Patient in front of Samas.
item.arstheurgia.written_clay_tablet_sam: Group 1: Purifying the Patient in front of Samas.
